body:
Satisfy sequel waiting for a third 
Idk i love yuri 
Don't mind the twist

kouji's work is kinda hit or miss for me and this one was def a miss. the poor grammar tag and me not usually being a fan of yuri in genderbender made me not really enjoy it. Has some good pages and some nice humiliation but other than that, it was eh.
Wtf kouji's art here isn't as good as their other works
Whats up boys did everyone have a great day/nut?

I was waiting this for so long. I didn't feel the bad grammar that much (maybe cuz I'm not native english speaker). Anyway, very good and solid Kouji work, loved the cameo of the pair from the first book.
Yeah just don’t bother with this one. Not really good enough to put effort into it, although page 32 does have a pretty good smug face.
I was waiting for this translation for so long...then I see the "poor grammar" tag and my heart just dropped...fuckin' tragic.
That smug face at page 32 tho
The art kinda sucks and on top of that it has the poor grammar tag so no thanks
Part 1 is #310745 //// This series has good art but man, it's a bit weird and shit. Give it a try!
